name: @ormgen/test.ecom
instruction: Use npm in order for the ormgen linking to work

scripts.ecom:prisma:gen: npm run ecom -- prisma generate --schema ecom/output/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.ecom:prisma:push: npm run ecom -- prisma db push --schema ecom/output/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.ecom:prisma:sync: npm run ecom:prisma:gen && npm run ecom:prisma:push
